items.title: Glacier melt will lead to ice-free peaks in California for first time in human history
bullets: • California's Sierra Nevada glaciers are projected to melt away completely by the beginning of the next century
• The mountain range’s glaciers are older than previously known, with some as old as the last ice age
• A future glacier-free Sierra Nevada is unprecedented in human history since known peopling of the Americas, researchers say

items.title: UK fines 4Chan over online safety compliance
bullets: • UK telecoms regulator Ofcom says the fine was issued after the social media site ignored “legally-binding information requests” related to global revenue and its illegal harms risk assessment

• 4Chan additionally faces a daily penalty of £100 (around $133) for either 60 days or until 4Chan complies with the information requests, up to a maximum of £6,000 (about $8,000) The investigation is still ongoing, and these mid-probe fines are significantly below the maximum £18 million in penalties
